doc: Radiobutton represents a user interface element which spans a visible area to click or tap from the user. Usually a radiobutton belongs to a group, where only a single element can be picked. Thus, it is quite similar to a Spinner/Select/Combobox.

1.doc: InputValue is where updated value of the checked states are written.
1.name: InputValue

2.doc: Value is the initial checked value.
2.name: Value
